name: Disable Google Fonts, Remove google fonts or Replace with Bunnyfonts
author: easywpstuff

sections.description:
Looking for a plugin to disable google fonts? this plugin gives you the option to remove Google Fonts from your website. or replace google fonts with Bunnyfonts, which they claim to be GDPR-compliant (Read More) and google fonts alternative. use the options in the plugin settings to make the switch and to confirm it use Google font checker.

Features

  • Option to replace external google fonts with BunnyFonts.
  • Option to remove all external google fonts from your website.
  • Option to remove google fonts using javascript.

Plugin Compatibility

This plugin will work with almost all the themes and page builders.

  • it can disable google fonts loading from elementor.
  • it can disable google fonts loading from wp bakery page builder.
  • it can remove google fonts loading from divi and any other theme.
sections.installation:
1. Unzip the plugin archive on your computer
  2. Upload directory to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Configure the options in the plugin settings to replace or remove Google Fonts as desired.
  5. That’s it! The plugin will do the rest.

Privacy Policy

This plugin uses Appsero SDK to collect some telemetry data upon user’s confirmation. This helps us to troubleshoot problems faster & make product improvements.

Integrating Appsero SDK DOES NOT IMMEDIATELY start gathering data, without confirmation from users in any case.
sections.faq:
Does this plugin remove Google Fonts?

Yes, this plugin gives you the option to completely remove all Google Fonts from your website’s HTML.

Does this plugin replace Google Fonts?

Yes, this plugin gives you the option to replace all external Google Fonts with BunnyFonts.

Does this plugin replace inline Google Fonts?

No, this plugin only replaces Google Fonts loaded from fonts.googleapis.com in your website.

What is BunnyFont?

BunnyFont is a fast and GDPR-compliant alternative to Google Fonts.

sections.screenshots: 1. Screenshot of plugin in action
sections.reviews:
Intrusive ads in dashboard

By jmxhd7 on June 27, 2023

Placing huge banners with your affiliate links in the wp-admin is a NO-NO. Just unacceptable. For a plugin that is "privacy-focused", that is a complete opposite of what you're supposed to do.

Very good, works better than any other comparable

By sotte on April 12, 2023

Very good addon, works better than any other comparable. All Google Fonts are recognised - except of course those that are used by externally integrated Google Tools like Reviews or Maps, but for that you need a Cookie Consent Banner anyway. Recommendation.

Great. Replace Google-Fonts with no efforts

By torsten3d on September 2, 2022

Keeps only GFonts in Services like Maps, ReCaptcha and so on... But that's OK.
